definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: shut, shut up (Mish. [[אטם]], cf. [[אוֹטֶם]] stoppage, Aram. [[אֲטַם]]; Ar. 0’at.ama contract, stop, 0’ut.mun fortress; As. aṭamu, in list of headgear, etc. = turban? Dl:W, No. 155)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. act. [[אׂטֵם]] Pr 17:28 + 2 t.; pass. [[אֲטֻמִים]] 1Ki 6:4; [[אֲטֻמוֹת]] Ez Eze 40:16 + 2 t.;—shut, stop, obj. lips Pr 17:28; ears Pr 21:13, Is 33:15; pass. = closed (i.e. narrowed, narrowing, cf. SyrVer in Co) ´[[חַלּוֹנוֹת א]] Ez Eze 40:16, Eze 41:16, Eze 41:26; cf. [[חַלּוֹנֵי שְׁקֻפִים אֲטֻמִים]] 1Ki 6:4.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. i.q. Qal [[יַאְטֵם]] Ps 58:5 (juss. with sense of indic., cf. Dr:§ 173 obs.) of adder, stopping ears, sim. of wicked.
